title: Destruction - D.E.V.O.L.U.T.I.O.N. (2008)
description:
Thrash metal madness in 2008 with Destruction's D.E.V.O.L.U.T.I.O.N. album. Destruction are a German thrash metal band from L"rrach, in southern Germany. They are considered one of the three large bands of the Teutonic thrash metal scene. The band were originally named "Knight of Demon", changing their name in 1984. D.E.V.O.L.U.T.I.O.N. is their tenth studio album and it features three guitarists as guest appearances, Gary Holt of Exodus and Jeff Waters of Annihilator, both playing solos in the song "Urge (The Greed of Gain)", in addition of Vinnie Moore from UFO.
